title: For the N173 Old Judge Fans
author: jwciv

posts.post_title: For the N173 Old Judge Fans
posts.post_content: came across a stash of 15 cards in an album, thought I'd share a few images.  probably going up to auction with REA

Were there any Columbus Solons?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

[quote name="shernan30" post=1619330]Were there any Columbus Solons?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

No.  Here's the list:
Kelly, Boston, with bat
Brouthers, Boston, with bat
Dwyer, Chicago, with ball
Chas Comisky, St. Louis Browns, on mound
H Duffy, Chicago, with bat
Brown, Boston, with bat
CA Farrell, Chicago, on mound
Gumbert, Chicago, with bat
C.C. King, St. Louis Browns, with ball
Ryan, Chicago, with ball
B. Nash, Boston (Dogs Head and Old Judge)
NY Mascot, with ball (Dogs Head and Old Judge)
Richardson, Boston, with bat
Radbourn, Boston, with ball
A Latham, St. Louis Browns, with bat

:eek:  Are you sure they are originals?

Rob M

[quote name="ramram" post=1619377]:eek:  Are you sure they are originals?

Rob M[/QUOTE]

Pretty sure based on source of cards. Why do you ask?
As they said in Seinfeld.........."they're real and they're spectacular!"

[quote name="jwciv" post=1619399]Pretty sure based on source of cards. Why do you ask?[/QUOTE]

Because it's such a rare find, rare condition, and has some heavy hitters in there. Also, its just a standard reaction when looking at them and drooling. 

Rob M
